Issue.creator: cam.ross
Issue.summary: Docker image for Kafka fails to build
Issue.description: When building the fabric docker images from master, the Kafka image creation is failing. The Docker.in file for this image is pointing to a distribution tarball that no longer exists (i.e. kafka_2.11-0.10.2.0.tgz) at the location specified. I am able to build the image by changing the tarball version to kafka_2.11-0.10.2.1.tgz and updating the associated checksum.
